H0.text: Lamprey is the fish that has a round sucker used to suck the blood of other fish.

H1.text: Shark is the fish that has a round sucker used to suck the blood of other fish.

H2.text: Abalone is a fish that has a round sucker used to suck the blood of other fish.

H3.text: Moray is the fish that has a round sucker used to suck the blood of other fish.

A4.text: The buccal cavity, anterior to the gonads, is responsible for attaching the animal, through suction, to either a stone or its prey.
